getDefaultExtension

public java.lang.String getDefaultExtension()
Description copied from class: ConfirmableFileFilter
Returns the default extension used by files filtered with this file filter.

Specified by:
getDefaultExtension in class ConfirmableFileFilter
Returns:
a string representing the default extension (ie. "tmx"), or null when a default extension doesn't exist (ie. when the filter determines the type using the extension)
